citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:57 pm on August
4, 2021. Knocked on door and no one answered. Contacted licensee by phone and they were not available . Stated
they have sold all breeding animals and plan on cancelling license.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:57 pm  on August 
4, 2021.  Knocked on door and no one answered.  Contacted licensee by phone and they were not available .  Stated 
they have sold all breeding animals and plan on cancelling license. 
 
 
 
End Section
